name: Wait, How Do I Reload?!
description:
Controls:
- Move with WASD
- Shoot with Left Click
- Exit with Alt + F4

"Okay, I get that shooting the zombies kills them but.... how do I reload this thing?"

"Wait, how do I reload?!" is a small prototype for the GJL 2021 Summer Game Parade. (Link)

The initial idea was that you would pick up guns along this zombie infested bridge, but you aren't very familiar with guns, and unable to reload. 
So once you were out of Ammo, you would have to throw the gun away (ideally, at a zombie) and satisfy the theme of "One Time Use".

Sadly, life got in the way and this mess was born. I don't even know if you can die, haha.
I intend to come back to it in future though, it was a nice little distraction!

Images and Code by me.
Music - Entry of the Gladiators
SFX - Chiptone, Wilhelm Scream
